directions: Bring almond milk and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Add cinnamon and vanilla beans; reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until all liquid is absorbed, about 15 minutes. Remove vanilla beans from quinoa.
Spoon quinoa into bowls; top each with raisins, chia seeds, and ground flax seeds.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chia seeds, or to taste
2 tablespoons ground flax seeds, or to taste
title: Warm Cinnamon Raisin Quinoa
